text: A taskmaster is a supervisor who imposes hard or burdensome work. Taskmaster may also refer to: ==Film and television== * Taskmaster (TV series), a British comedy panel show * Taskmaster (American TV series), an American version of the British show * Egyptian taskmaster, a role in The Ten Commandments (1956 film) ==Literature== * Taskmaster (comics), a Marvel Comics supervillain * Egyptian taskmaster, killed by Moses according to the Book of Exodus ==Other media== * Kevin Sullivan (wrestler) (born 1949), an American wrestler nicknamed "The Taskmaster" * "Taskmaster", song by the grindcore band Pig Destroyer on Painter of Dead Girls * "Taskmaster", song by Hullabaloo on Beat Until Stiff
title: Taskmaster
